TABLE.NAME: jazzquiz
TABLE.COMMENT: A JazzQuiz is the reference table of which sessions may be created from. Does not change during a session.

FIELD.NAME: defaultquestiontime
FIELD.COMMENT: How long do they get for each question?

FIELD.NAME: waitforquestiontime
FIELD.COMMENT: The time to wait for a question before displaying students the question

TABLE.NAME: jazzquiz_questions
TABLE.COMMENT: Reference table for questions in a JazzQuiz. Does not change during a session.

FIELD.NAME: jazzquizid
FIELD.COMMENT: The JazzQuiz this question is associated with

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The question id for the question in the question engine

FIELD.NAME: questiontime
FIELD.COMMENT: Question time in seconds. 0 means default for the quiz

FIELD.NAME: slot
FIELD.COMMENT: Which order the question is in. Not to be confused with the slot in a session question.

TABLE.NAME: jazzquiz_sessions
TABLE.COMMENT: A session is a unique instance of a JazzQuiz

FIELD.NAME: sessionopen
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether or not the session is open

FIELD.NAME: showfeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether or not students should receive feedback after answering

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The current status/state of the session

FIELD.NAME: slot
FIELD.COMMENT: This is which JazzQuiz question was last run. Not related to session questions.

FIELD.NAME: currentquestiontime
FIELD.COMMENT: The time the current question is allowed in seconds

FIELD.NAME: nextstarttime
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp of the next start time

FIELD.NAME: created
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp for when this session was created.

TABLE.NAME: jazzquiz_session_questions
TABLE.COMMENT: Questions for a specific JazzQuiz session

FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id for the question in the question bank

FIELD.NAME: questiontime
FIELD.COMMENT: Question time in seconds.

FIELD.NAME: slot
FIELD.COMMENT: The question number in the question usage by activity (quba). Starts at 1 and is incremented for every new question.

TABLE.NAME: jazzquiz_attempts
TABLE.COMMENT: A JazzQuiz attempt maps the question usage by activity (quba) and its question attempts for a student within a particular session.

FIELD.NAME: questionengid
FIELD.COMMENT: The question (engine) usage id

FIELD.NAME: guestsession
FIELD.COMMENT: To identify guest users.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: Which state the attempt is in.

FIELD.NAME: responded
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether or not the user responded for the particular session's current question

FIELD.NAME: timestart
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp for when the attempt was started

FIELD.NAME: timefinish
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp for when the attempt was finished

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp for when this attempt was modified

FIELD.NAME: attempt
FIELD.COMMENT: The student answer in raw text format

FIELD.NAME: initialcount
FIELD.COMMENT: How many students answered this initially

FIELD.NAME: finalcount
FIELD.COMMENT: How many students answered this during the vote

FIELD.NAME: userlist
FIELD.COMMENT: List of users who have voted. TODO: Normalize

FIELD.NAME: qtype
FIELD.COMMENT: Which question type it was. TODO: Remove, as it can be reached by slot column

FIELD.NAME: slot
FIELD.COMMENT: The session question slot this vote was created for

FIELD.NAME: slot
FIELD.COMMENT: The session question slot this vote was created for

FIELD.NAME: ordernum
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of merges that happened before this one for this slot.

FIELD.NAME: original
FIELD.COMMENT: The original response

FIELD.NAME: merged
FIELD.COMMENT: The merged response
